mapper.select: select count(*) from roompayment where status=-1 or status=-2

select rownum,SEQ,id,BRANCHNAME,ROOMNUM,reservdate,STATUS from (SELECT SEQ,id,BRANCHNAME,ROOMNUM,reservdate,STATUS FROM ROOMPAYMENT
ORDER BY reservdate desc)

choose.when: where (status=-1 or status=-2) and branchName = #{branchName} and (roomnum like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or id like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

mapper.sql: select * from ( select rownum as rn,A.* from(
mapper.select: select SUBSTR(reservstate,0,INSTR(reservstate,(select SUBSTR(reservetime,0,5) from roompayment where seq=#{seq}))-1)||SUBSTR(reservstate,INSTR(reservstate,(select SUBSTR(reservetime,LENGTH(reservetime)-4,LENGTH(reservetime)) from roompayment where seq=#{seq}))+5,LENGTH(reservstate)) from roomreserv where to_char(startdate,'yy/MM/dd') like TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(REPLACE(#{reservdate}, 'KST ', ''), 'Dy Mon DD HH24:MI:SS YYYY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN'), 'yy/MM/dd') and roomnum=#{roomnum}
